 @input="$emit('input', $event)" ></v-navigation-drawer>

```js
<v-list dense>
  <v-list-item
    v-for="(item, index) in menu"
    :key="index"
    link>
    <v-list-item-action>
      <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
    </v-list-item-action>
    <v-list-item-content>
      <v-list-item-title>{{ item.name }}</v-list-item-
                                                 title>
    </v-list-item-content>
  </v-list-item>
</v-list>
```

  />

  />

 <slot/>
 </v-content>
 </v-app> </template>
